title: Part B

title: Part F
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that Zeetoland’s exports will decrease and/or does not explain that the appreciation of the zeet will make Zeetoland’s goods and services relatively more expensive than other countries’ goods and services. .
